function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Enhanced surveillance and reporting","category":"Surveillance and Reporting","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase testing capacity and accessibility, prioritize testing for high-risk individuals and areas, utilize alternative testing methods such as wastewater-based surveillance.","category":"Testing Capacity and Accessibility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop and promote non-invasive testing methods, such as saliva or wastewater-based surveillance, to increase testing uptake.","category":"Testing Methods","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversify suppliers and establish backup systems to ensure a steady supply","category":"Supply Chain Resilience","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of
